thread.title: Xbox Games with Gold for February detailed
thread.title_full: Xbox Games with Gold for February detailed

title: Xbox Games with Gold for February detailed
text:
Xbox Games with Gold for February detailed Force Unleashed! Monkey Island! Lovers! Project Cars! By Tom Phillips Published 24/01/2017 
Microsoft has revealed another eye-catching line-up for its Xbox Live Games with Gold promotion, this time headlined by LucasArts classics Star Wars: The Force Unleashed and Monkey Island 2. 
Both Xbox 360 games are, as usual, also playable on Xbox One. 
The former is available 1-15th February, the latter from 16th-28th. 
Xbox One owners also get Project Cars and indie hit Lovers in a Dangerous Spacetime, which earned itself a glowing recommendation in Eurogamer's review . 
Lovers will be available to cosy up with all through the month of February, while Project Cars will be downloadable from 16th February until 15th March. Project CARS, Star Wars: The Force Unleashed and more are your Games with Gold this February: https://t.co/s7mx8eXISe pic.twitter.com/vCRiFU6KTr â€” Xbox UK (@xboxuk) January 24, 2017 Games featured in this article
